SoftShellWeb Offers 1GB Unmetered in Taiwan/Amsterdam/California for $39/year!

amsterdam, california, softshellweb, taiwan December 23, 2020 @ 12:00 am, by raindog308

SoftShellWeb started submitting offers for LEB readers in August and did a great job bringing good offers to LEB readers during Black Friday.  I noted in one of my roundups that they have an amazing green hosting commitment: they plant a tree for every month you have hosting with them.

They’ve got some December specials for you all, including some based in Taiwan which is not a common location.

  • 1GB unmetered transfer (fair share) in either Taiwan, Amsterdam, or California, starting at $39/year!

SoftShellWeb is a registered UK company.  You should check out their Terms of Service and if you agree, you can pay with PayPal, Alipay, Debit/Credit Card, BitCoin, UnionPay, WebMoney, Moneta, QIWI, India Netbanking, iDeal, SOFORT Banking, DOKU, DragonPay, Boleto, Banco do Brasil, Alfa-Click, Malaysia e-banking, Pago Fácil, Rapi Pago, Red Pagos, and/or Bancontact.

Remember that the LEB community would love to hear about your experience in the comments section below!

Here’s what they had to say: 

“At SoftShellWeb we love December and the Happy Holiday Spirit! Therefore we made some special deals for the community that helped us grow and expand our services onto 3 different continents. As the demand for unmetered bandwidth grows we have decided to offer unmetered plans in our Amsterdam and California locations, which are suitable for almost all clients. We are looking forward to expand our current offer and to meet the requirements of our clients and the low end community. 2020 was a truly unique and special year for us with all the help and trust that we received from this community that has helped us grow and set a foothold in the industry.”

Now read more to see the offers!
